sentences.en: He joined his family in Erie, Pennsylvania, and got a job on the Erie Gazette.
sentences.cn: 他回到了宾夕法尼亚州伊利的家中并在当地的,《伊利报》报社找到一份工作.

sentences.en: He took out a copy of the Berkhamsted Gazette.
sentences.cn: 他取出一份《伯克哈姆斯特德报》.

sentences.en: He was reading The Phoenix Gazette.
He. may outwear those unattractive qualities of character ( Westminster Gazette )
sentences.cn: 随着一天长大,他也许会改掉那些不好的品格 ( 威斯敏斯特公报 )

sentences.en: Q: How are The GazettE songs made?
sentences.cn: 你们的歌曲是怎麽做的?

sentences.en: Thanks. Here goes: the Daily News, the Stamford Gazette.
sentences.cn: 谢谢. 这儿有各种报纸: 《每日新闻》 、 《斯坦福德公报》.

sentences.en: The Chief Executive in Council may notice in the Gazette amend the Schedule.
sentences.cn: 行政长官会同行政会议可藉宪报公告修订附表.

sentences.en: The Chief Executive may, by order published in the Gazette, amend the Schedule.
sentences.cn: 行政长官可藉宪报刊登的命令修订附表.

sentences.en: The enterprise was named in the gazette.
The following appeared in an editorial in the Garden City Gazette.
sentences.cn: 下述文字摘自《花园城市报》的某篇社论.

sentences.en: The Gazette says the movie " will freeze the blood in your veins. "
sentences.cn: 《论坛》报说,这部电影使观众感到 “ 血管中的血液凝结起来 ”.

sentences.en: The Governor may by order published in the Gazette amend any Schedule to this Ordinance.
sentences.cn: 总督可借宪报命令修订本条例任何附表.

sentences.en: The London Gazette, the oldest surviving journal, is first published.
sentences.cn: 1665年的今天, 现存最古老的一份期刊 —— 《伦敦公报》首次出版发行.

sentences.en: The Stamford Gazette. Let me find it.
sentences.cn: 《斯坦福德公报》. 让我来找一下.

trans.tran_en: an official newspaper, especially one from the government giving important lists of people who have been employed by them etc
